person.persName: Cyrus Knowlton (Hamilton County, Ohio, teacher and attorney.)

body.p: Hamilton County, Ohio, teacher and attorney. Brandon, Rutland County, Vermont, native. Son of Caleb Knowlton and Anna Knowlton. Married to Adaline Dodge Knowlton on December 31, 1851. Father of Carrie Knowlton, Emma A. Knowlton, and Alice Knowlton. Attended Vermont Literary and Scientific Institution in 1841. Attended Brown University in 1844. Teacher in Cincinnati, Hamilton County, Ohio in 1850. Attorney in Hamilton County, Ohio in 1860. Employed Catharine Towmy as a domestic servant in 1860.
